set_bulb_light_color.success_prompt: Lamp colors have been successfully changed. Use creative descriptions, comparisons, everyday terms, or associations to convey colors. DO NOT WRITE HEX CODES # OR COLOR CODES INTO THE OUTPUT!

get_bulb_light_colors.success_prompt: Use creative descriptions, comparisons, everyday terms, or associations to convey colors. DO NOT WRITE HEX CODES # OR COLOR CODES INTO THE OUTPUT!

set_smart_device_on_off.success_prompt: The state of the Smart Device has been successfully changed. Reminder: The device is now either switched on or switched off.

get_smart_device_on_off_state.success_prompt: The current state of the Smart Device has been successfully retrieved. Reminder: The device is either switched on or switched off.
